mapper.sql: id, article_id AS articleId, content, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT ai.id, ai.author_id, ai.title, ai.keyword, ai.description, ai.views_num, ai.comment_num, ai.star_num, ai.status, ai.url, ai.create_time, a.content, u.nickname AS author, c.name AS category FROM t_article_info ai LEFT JOIN t_article a ON ai.id = a.article_id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON ai.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON ai.category_id = c.id WHERE ai.id = #{articleId}

SELECT ai.id, ai.author_id, ai.title, ai.keyword, ai.description, ai.views_num, ai.comment_num, ai.star_num, ai.status, ai.url, ai.create_time, u.nickname AS author, c.name AS category FROM t_article_info ai LEFT JOIN t_user u ON ai.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON ai.category_id = c.id where ai.status = 0
